page.title: 02CORNBURY ESTATE ORGANISATION
page.content: {Cornbury Estate}totals {l360 ha; 1250 {ha}is {tenanted farmland}, the majority rented by the owner's son, the rest by 3 other farmers. {202 ha {of parkland}surround{Cornbury House} with {728 ha Wychwood Forest}lying to the West. The Estate employs {25 full- {time staff and 2 part-time}. 3 f.t. and 2 p.t. work in the house, 2 in the garden, 6 gamekeepers, 2 foresters on estate work, 6 maintenance, 4 at the stud and the Agent with a secretary in the Office. He supervises everything for the Owner who is in residence at weekends.{14 estate employees live in {houses owned by Cornbury}, also 2 retired workers. 9 houses are let. The {whole forested area }is a {Site {of Special Scientific Interest}and { {262 ha}of this is a {National Nature {Reserve }with controlled access. The {80ha }of farmland in hand is the{Stud.
